languages.text: {n}Лицо слуги слегка перекашивается, но голос остается идеально ровным и вежливым.{/n} "Я передам ваши слова Лорд-инквизитору. Не смею больше задерживать Вашу Светлость".

{n}The servant's face twists a little, but his voice remains perfectly flat and polite.{/n} "I will pass on your reply to the Lord Inquisitor. I dare not intrude upon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's time any longer."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо слуги слегка перекашивается, но голос остается идеально ровным и вежливым.{/n} "Я передам ваши слова Лорд-инквизитору. Не смею больше задерживать Вашу Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}The servant's face twists a little but his voice remains perfectly flat and polite.{/n} "I will pass your reply on to the Lord Inquisitor. I dare intrude upon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's time no more."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}仆人的脸微微僵了僵，但声音依然平和有礼。{/n}“我会将您的回复转达给大审判官大人。我不敢继续耽搁您的时间了，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servant's face twists a little, but his voice remains perfectly flat and polite.{/n} "I will pass on your reply to the Lord Inquisitor. I dare not intrude upon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's time any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}仆人的脸微微僵了僵，但声音依然平和有礼。{/n}“我会将您的回复转达给审判长大人。我不敢继续耽搁您的时间了，大人。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}召使は顔をゆがめながらも、平たく礼儀正しい声を保っていた。{/n}「あなたのお答えを、ロード・インクィジターにお伝えします。もう陛下のお邪魔はしません」
languages.original_text: {n}The servant's face twists a little, but his voice remains perfectly flat and polite.{/n} "I will pass on your reply to the Lord Inquisitor. I dare not intrude upon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's time any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}召使は顔をゆがめながらも、平たく礼儀正しい声を保っていた。{/n}「あなたのお答えを、ロード・インクィジターにお伝えします。もう陛下のお邪魔はしません」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}La cara del sirviente se tuerce ligeramente, pero su voz permanece sin cambios y educada.{/n} «Transmitiré su respuesta al Lord Inquisidor. No me atrevería a robarle más tiempo, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The servant's face twists a little, but his voice remains perfectly flat and polite.{/n} "I will pass on your reply to the Lord Inquisitor. I dare not intrude upon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's time any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara del sirviente se tuerce ligeramente, pero su voz permanece sin cambios y educada.{/n} «Transmitiré su respuesta al Lord Inquisidor. No me atrevo a quitarle más tiempo, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht des Dieners entgleist kurz, doch seine Stimme bleibt vollkommen flach und höflich.{/n} "Ich werde dem Großinquisitor Eure Antwort übermitteln. Ich wage es nicht länger, die Zeit Eurer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft zu beanspruchen."
languages.original_text: {n}The servant's face twists a little, but his voice remains perfectly flat and polite.{/n} "I will pass on your reply to the Lord Inquisitor. I dare not intrude upon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's time any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gesicht des Dieners entgleist kurz, doch seine Stimme bleibt vollkommen flach und höflich.{/n} "Ich werde dem Großinquisitor Eure Antwort übermitteln. Ich wage es nicht länger, die Zeit Eurer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft zu beanspruchen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}L'homme vous répond d'une voix égale et polie, même si vous remarquez ses traits se tendre :{/n} « Je transmettrai votre réponse au seigneur inquisiteur. Je ne retiendrai pas Votre Seigneurie plus longtemps. »
languages.original_text: {n}The servant's face twists a little, but his voice remains perfectly flat and polite.{/n} "I will pass on your reply to the Lord Inquisitor. I dare not intrude upon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's time any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme vous répond d'une voix égale et polie, même si vous remarquez ses traits se tendre :{/n} « Je transmettrai votre réponse au seigneur inquisiteur. Je ne retiendrai pas Votre Seigneurie plus longtemps. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Hizmetkârın yüzü biraz buruşsa da sesi, kusursuz hissizliğini ve nezaketini kaybetmiyor.{/n} "Yanıtınızı Lord Engizisyoncu'ya ileteceğim. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin zamanını daha fazla alma cüretinde bulunmayayım."
languages.original_text: {n}The servant's face twists a little, but his voice remains perfectly flat and polite.{/n} "I will pass on your reply to the Lord Inquisitor. I dare not intrude upon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's time any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetkârın yüzü biraz buruşuyor ancak sesi kusursuz hissizliğini ve nezaketini kaybetmiyor.{/n} "Yanıtınızı Lord Engizisyoncu'ya ileteceğim. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin zamanını daha fazla alma cüretinde bulunmayayım."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche
